name: Puppeteer
description: Automate browser actions including navigation, screenshots, and web interactions

env.name: Puppeteer Launch Options
env.description: JSON-encoded string to customize Puppeteer browser launch parameters, such as headless mode, executable path, and browser args.

env.name: Allow Dangerous
env.description: If set to 'true', allows dangerous launch options (e.g., --no-sandbox) that reduce security.
